CONCLUSION: Violation of Art. 6-1;Violation of P1-1;Pecuniary damage - claim dismissed;Non-pecuniary damage - financial award
TEXT: CARDINAL . The applicant was born in DATE and resides in the town of GPE , GPE , GPE .
CARDINAL . The applicant instituted proceedings in the ORG of Donetsk Region against ORG No . CARDINAL – a ORG - owned enterprise – to recover salary arrears .

CARDINAL . On DATE the ORG found in favour of the applicant ( ORG городского суда PERSON области ) and awarded him ORG CARDINAL,CARDINAL.CARDINAL . On DATE ORG ( PERSON исполнительной службы Новогродовского городского управления юстиции ) initiated the enforcement proceedings .
CARDINAL . By a number of decisions of ORG of GPE , ORG had been prohibited from selling the property of ORG , due to the bankruptcy proceedings which had been initiated against the company .
CARDINAL . In DATE the judgment in the applicant ’s favour was enforced in full .
CARDINAL . The relevant domestic law is summarised in the judgment of ORG v. GPE ( no . CARDINAL/CARDINAL , § CARDINAL , DATE ) .
